name: Tactical Bullet Hell Shooter
description:
A Top-Down Tactical Bullet Hell Shooter.  This unique mash-up of genres provides an action-packed experience. Your only objective is to reach the end of the level alive. Fight your way through enemy lines as they rain down bullets on you, in desperate attempts to end you.


Code Named Javelin.  A.i. and Remotely controlled Cybernetic Soldiers created to reduce human casualties in combat situations.

There are currently no official maps.

 AK47Rapid firing gun with fairly fast bullets and large clip size. SHOTGUN55 shots spread randomly and bullets bounce off walls. SHOTBOISlow firing weapon with bullets that  bounce off walls Grenade10 damage Smoke Grenade Conceals an area for 20 secondsBotDeploy a bot that provides recon and explode after 7 secs

Many more weapons and items are planned and will be developed and released in the future.

Here are some of the features we have planned.

Multiplayer - Users battle each other in a tactical arena. Buy guns and outsmart your opponents using traps, tactical equipment, and lethal explosives. Capture your enemy beacon and eliminate their squad. Each team has one beacon. This is your team's only spawn spot. When your beacon is captured, you are unable to re-spawn on your beacon. Recover your Beacon, capture the enemy Beacon, and eliminate their team.

You can support development via these options below.
